## Description {#details}

A structured debug information entry.

Has an abbreviation which describes its organization.

Definition at line 819 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/codegen/die-h">DIE.h</a>.

  labels = {["inline"]}>

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/codegen/die-h/#l00878">878</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/codegen/die-h">DIE.h</a>.

### computeOffsetsAndAbbrevs() {#a4db4b8aaa0f0da8dd11c5a279f4cfd6c}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>unsigned DIE::computeOffsetsAndAbbrevs (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/dwarf/formparams">dwarf::FormParams</a> &amp; FormParams, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/dieabbrevset">DIEAbbrevSet</a> &amp; AbbrevSet, unsigned CUOffset)</>}>
Compute the offset of this <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/die">DIE</a> and all its children.

This function gets called just before we are going to generate the debug information and gives each <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/die">DIE</a> a chance to figure out its <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/cu">CU</a> relative <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/die">DIE</a> offset, unique its abbreviation and fill in the abbreviation code, and return the unit offset that points to where the next <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/die">DIE</a> will be emitted within the debug unit section. After this function has been called for all <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/die">DIE</a> objects, the DWARF can be generated since all DIEs will be able to properly refer to other <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/die">DIE</a> objects since all DIEs have calculated their offsets.


<ParametersList title="Parameters">
<ParametersListItem name="FormParams">Used when calculating sizes.</ParametersListItem>
<ParametersListItem name="AbbrevSet">the abbreviation used to unique <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/die">DIE</a> abbreviations.</ParametersListItem>
<ParametersListItem name="CUOffset">the compile/type unit relative offset in bytes.</ParametersListItem>
</ParametersList>

<SectionUser title="Returns">
the offset for the <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/die">DIE</a> that follows this <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/die">DIE</a> within the current compile/type unit.
</SectionUser>

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/codegen/die-h/#l00913">913</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/codegen/die-h">DIE.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/asmprinter/die-cpp/#l00266">266</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/asmprinter/die-cpp">DIE.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### findAttribute() {#a008bf8f3472eb0014e766bac06fbe537}

<MemberDefinition

Find a value in the <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/die">DIE</a> with the attribute given.

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/codegen/die-h/#l00952">952</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/codegen/die-h">DIE.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/asmprinter/die-cpp/#l00210">210</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/asmprinter/die-cpp">DIE.cpp</a>.

### Owner {#a9f63989aa5de6e7b9bc1f29b8fe7a888}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>PointerUnion&lt;DIE &#42;, DIEUnit &#42;&gt; llvm::DIE::Owner</>}>
The owner is either the parent <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/die">DIE</a> for children of other DIEs, or a <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/dieunit">DIEUnit</a> which contains this <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/die">DIE</a> as its unit <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/die">DIE</a>.
